actions.recommendation: Normal clinical exam on the day of consultation. Please report on any new changes in your health in the coming months
Waist circumference is less than 80 cm and BMI of <25. These are associated with a lower risk of heart disease and diabetes. Good job!
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologist for a Pap Smear.
Gastritis - resolved - dx with H pylori
Please follow the advice regarding your lab results and retest at the recommended intervals.

If you cannot determine a date, use 'Not specified'. Status determination rules: - If recommendation involves repeating something in the future → status = 'Planned' - If recommendation is lifestyle advice or ongoing monitoring → status = 'Ongoing' - If it is a screening already completed → status = 'Completed' - If status cannot be determined from text, use 'Not specified'.
